Name: Swedish Rum Punch
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: A flavoursome Daiquiri-style with the subtle spice of Swedish punch.
History: Created in 2008 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Swedish Rum Punch contains 182 calories
